website_summaries.verdict: This glittery liquid eyeliner provides an intense shine that will last all day or night. Comes in dozens of vibrant shades.
pros: Can be easily applied as an eyeliner or painted on the eyelid for a fuller shimmer
cons: Some reports of the liquid being somewhat heavy on the lids

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: BEST GLITTER SHADOWS ON THE MARKET! i have five colors and all are gorgeous. Surprisingly blendable for a liquid and minimal fallout of the glitter, almost none. The formula is great and. You don't have to worry about ba glitter primer. Stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Believe what you read, best glitter eyeshadow on the market. Very pretty and awesome for a night out or a date. Remember to do your under eye makeup first or you will get glitter all over your face (if you use a brush to blend, otherwise it doesn't flake), I forget every time!
customer_reviews.author: RayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love it...but not for oldies like me...
customer_reviews.text: I tried it on...& almost had the gravitasse to wear it out of my home....but, frankly...(and thankfully)...I know where to quit. Instead, I regally handed this to my 30 year old daughter & went and cried in the dark, with a box of bonbons. The baton has changed hands. It was a really good run though.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Its shinny
customer_reviews.text: I like how pigmented it is I will update if it doesn't last all night
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Elegantly Sparkly
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have used in years- the glitter stays put. It doesn’t leave tacky residue on your eyelids. You can easily control how mych pr how little product you want to use. I’m 47 and I know that 40+ year old women aren’t ‘supposed’ to wear glittery products, but this looks positively elegant. I’d give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G

customer_reviews.title: Mine came almost empty
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this product. I had ordered two of them - $25 each. So I spent $50 just to receive two of them that are 90% empty!? Both boxes that contained the item were already opened, with no seal. And just had a few specs of glitter on it. I am seriously disturbed by this and am going to request a refund. Too bad this item really did look cute in the photos other customers had attached.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Glitter Glitter Glitter YAASSS!
customer_reviews.text: I love glitter, like would be happy if my walls were painted in glitter and sparkled forever. Of course my eyes should do the same. After watching I don’t know how many youtube videos I had to get this. It goes on super smooth and has a ton of glitter. The glitter stays put all day with little to no fall out. I love it and will be buying more colors. It also looks great over a smoky eye to get some sparkle. This color is a great starter color, goes with everything and looks great alone.
customer_reviews.author: girlypantsTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous glitter dazzle!
customer_reviews.text: stila always impresses and this product definitely shines. I had asked a girl at Sephora what she was wearing on her eyes and she said this product, and they were out of stock, so I had ordered it online. It's amazing! Glitter extremes and it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hartner

customer_reviews.title: Actual glitter
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have realized based on the title, but this product has literal glitter in it that will end up all over your face. I thought it would be shimmery, but it is full on glitter. Unfortunately reminds me of being 12 again and can’t wear it on a typical day.... maybe NYE only
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff but bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff & use it all the time as my go to eyeshadow for my lid... but the packaging is terrible. It dries out a bit fast & it’s extremely hard to get what’s left in the bottom of the container so please consider new packaging fir this or a round tube instead of square in the future. So much product gets wasted so it’s a bit expensive for what you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: Keoc12

customer_reviews.title: Best glitter shadow!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this shadow. It goes on wet, you don't need to rub it in, it will dry within a couple minutes and stays all day. You never have to worry about the glitter getting all over your face and it literally lasts all day! I always get compliments on it whenever I wear it. This color is also perfect skin tone but enough to pop out. Also try Stila felt tip liner. It's the only liner I will use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather nielson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product is so beautiful. It's easy to work with but you don't have too much time to play with it before it dries. The one time I tried blending it out after it dried there was fallout all day, but if you put it on and blend it quick then it doesn't move at all. Still comes off easily though when using eye makeup remover or micellar water. The colors turn out just like they do in swatches.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Pictures don’t do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this liquid glitter shadow! I’ve used it about three times now, and it’s lasted the entire day each time. Even today when I tested it without primer! I have pretty hooded eyes, and this doesn’t seem to transfer much after it’s dried and set. Definitely better than any other glitter cosmetic I’ve used before! I’ve gotten lots of compliments on it as well, which is always nice. I can’t wait to buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dramatically beautiful, but value my eyesight more...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Lasted longer than most. Unfortunately, my contacts and eyes can’t handle this. The Rose Gold, although beautiful, gave me a reaction. Not sure if the formula or the glitter. Will need to return. If you can handle it minus a reaction, ensure to clean off your eyelids before sleeping. Or you’ll wake up with red eyes and a face & eyes with tiny specks of glitter that falls from the product.
customer_reviews.author: A frugal consumer

customer_reviews.title: Too subtle, too thin, watery
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t love it as much as I thought I would. It’s very watery and condensed. Goes on thin and doesn’t have the WOW factor I’ve seen on Instagram models and other tutorial videos I’ve watched with this product. I haven’t used this product before so it may be a fake but I can’t make that assumption. I’m just saying it certainly didn’t look that awesome on me and wore off a bit throughout the day. I don’t hate it, it’s still pretty but very subtle and I was not looking for subtle with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t expecting a glitter bomb on my face
customer_reviews.text: The fallout is terrible. After just a couple hours of wear my entire face is covered in glitter. I could even see glitter particles dusting off of my face to the floor. I even tried it again with setting spray and still a hot glittery mess
customer_reviews.author: Autumn S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly my new favorite eye makeup. Rose gold retro is such a pretty and delicate color. I've had zero fallout issues--and that's without a primer. I also carefully apply it and don't try and blend. I put it on solo or last. Definitely getting all the colors now. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Best glitter eyeshadow ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best glitter eyeshadow ever! I will be buying this forever. It lasts all day! I went to the gas station after a loooong day at work and the woman at the register loved the glitter and asked if I had put it on recently because it looked so fresh. She was surprised I had put it on like 12 hours earlier. People are always asking me what brand it is when I wear it
customer_reviews.author: Dana Storey

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! Bought champagne color after watching a Lisa Eldridge video (fav Christmas beauty gifts) and she had lined her upper lash line with it, which is how I use it. I take a tiny brush and paint just along lashes. So pretty on. Be prepared for fallout until it dries. Would also recommend curling lashes first. I’m about to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Femmelady

customer_reviews.title: Shine bright like a diamond <3
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness I am obsessed with this eyeshadow. The sparkle! So so beautiful! I have gotten so many compliments. It’s so glittery that it’s probably not super great for, say, the office, but I LOVE IT! Lasts forever and looks absolutely amazing. Get ready to shine! If you found this review helpful, please like it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Finer

customer_reviews.title: Glitter eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Stila glitter eyeshadow. It's super easy to use and not messy - it glides on wet exactly where you want it to be, then dries and stays in place, and doesn't go everywhere. It's very expensive, but it looks fab and doesn't get in your eyes, so I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pillowtalk

customer_reviews.title: OH MY GOODNESS THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. If you love glitter and having a glitter ...
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOODNESS THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. If you love glitter and having a glitter packed eye shadow with no fallout this is the one you want. A small amount of product goes a LONG WAY. I will be ordering more colors. Perfect for full eyelid looks, cut crease, eyeliner, etc. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kari R

customer_reviews.title: Allergy reaction
customer_reviews.text: I have never been allergic to any product before. This product caused an allergy in my eyes. My eyes and the area under the eyes were completely red. I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana R

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My makeup artist used it on me for a wedding and I loved it so much i had to purchase. It lasts all day, you only need one swipe of the stuff on your eyelids and it takes a min or two to completely dry. Nothing falls off into your eyes or anything. I literally get daily compliments on this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse89

customer_reviews.title: totally fantastic
customer_reviews.text: gift for my daughter on her wish list when she opened the box she was thrilled and took off to the bathroom and came out with that black shinney glitter on her eyes and proud as she could be , i would say this is a fantastic product and seller got it right on time great service
customer_reviews.author: oboy

customer_reviews.title: use finger to dab it onto lid or lips but don’t think the wand will make it look good, it won’t
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use wand, use finger to dab it onto lid or lips but don’t think the wand will make it look good, it won’t. Dab a little at a time, buildable. Avoid putting into eyes of course.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This glitter is beautiful but its very glittery
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is beautiful but its very glittery! I don't wear it very much because I feel like it's "too much".
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay..
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be more pigmented. It is cute but not worth the price. You have to be very skilled in makeup to get the most out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Whishful Thinking

customer_reviews.title: So shimmery
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful eyeshadow that is great for any occasion where you just need a pop of shimmer to enhance what your wearing. You can apply it with the wand but I find that applying it with your finger is easier. I also use it with other eyeshadow as well. I get a ton of compliments when I have it on!
customer_reviews.author: ThatJonesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to order more colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I wish all my eyeshadow was this easy to apply! I would say that it might not be ideal for an all day wear because it can begin to crease and drop some glitter down onto my cheeks. But for a night out or a special day at work, I love it. I've gotten so many compliments on it. I can't wait to try some other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Eyeshadow!
customer_reviews.text: This eye shadow is even better in person than it looked on a few Youtube videos I saw. It has an amazing sheen to it and the color is beautiful! I can’t wait to get more! If you like glitter eyeshadow that looks elegant than this is for you. It’s not like some others out there that look like you sprinkled glitter on your eyelids. I’m 43 and it’s totally appropriate just as a point of reference. Buy it, you won’t regret it...
customer_reviews.author: Silverlining1

customer_reviews.title: Great universal color
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The color is great, goes with all eyeshadows, minimal fallout, easy to apply, gives a nice wet look without looking like a disco ball. It is glitter, but somehow, on the eye, a little on the lid, from center to inner eye, it just gives a nice glow, twinkle.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful liquid eyeshadow. So unique with so much dimension. To me, it applies best by adding some to your eyelid with the applicator and then blending with finger. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I returned it as even though it's easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I returned it as even though it's easy to apply, it does crease and the color is lighter than expected. I also had to apply it more than once throughout the summer day. Bummer. It is quite shimmery. I returned it as it was also higher in price than I usually pay for makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B

customer_reviews.title: and then gently wipe the excess onto your cheeks for a beautiful glitter effect
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is magical! you can apply a little, or a lot. use fingers to smooth, and then gently wipe the excess onto your cheeks for a beautiful glitter effect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stiles

customer_reviews.title: I use this stuff almost every day. You want a lot of glitter? You want just a little glitter?
customer_reviews.text: seriously, this stuff is so versatile. it's light enough to smear around your eyes for a day when you don't want to wear makeup but want to look like you don't have the flu. It's glimmery enough that you can layer it and be a rose gold disco ball among high society.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy DiDonato

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Like anything else with glitter you do end up with some in places you don’t want it, but I simple swipe of a Makeup Eraser cloth takes it off. Bought two colors!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been hesitant about buying makeup online when I haven’t had it before just because you never know what your going to get but this was an awesome find. Stila is fantastic. Is a beautiful color and is easy to apply. I’m going to get another color as well now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: So gorgeous! I’m obsessed with the color and quality it does stay on forever. I will definitely be getting more colors love this so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer August

customer_reviews.title: So easy.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Hillary Duff on Instagram- she used Bronze Bell- I went for Kitten Karma as it is not as dramatic. I also saw a YouTube video of a gal trying out the Stila glitter & glow products. I agree with her review: That they are extremely quick and easy to apply, and give the appearance that you spent a bunch of time and effort to achieve the look- but you didn’t! I am getting more shades for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you use it all day, then you might want to touch up. For me, I used it in the afternoon and was good till the next morning (no, I don't wash my face at night.) Worth the buy. If you're like me, the Sephora points don't mean as much as the coupon on Amazon. Was cheaper even after taxes.
customer_reviews.author: rdmq17

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, easy to apply, stays on until you take it off. I get compliments every time I wear this eyeshadow. I bought a knock off of this for $6 and it was complete garbage. This is high quality and you don’t need a lot of it. Just a little dab and lightly blend with your finger. Buy this eyeshadow! It’s worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Karen Estelle

customer_reviews.title: The still formula is by far the best glitter shadow I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The still formula is by far the best glitter shadow I've ever used! There is little to no fallout. They are a little pricey, but if you like warm neutrals you will love these shadows. I have kitten karma, rose gold retro, & bronzed bell. All three are beautiful....rose gold retro is by far the most stunning of the three. If your looking for striking colors these might not be for you there is a striking purple but that's about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I plan on getting another color from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I plan on getting another color from the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to enhance my makeup on Halloween. Shoot, don’t wait on Halloween! This stuff is so pretty and fun to wear! Can’t say as I’ll be wearing it to work, but I may just apply it the weekends a few times!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie S

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in kitten karma. I saw it on youtube (livingjody) and it completely lived up to expectations. Its very sparkly and the color is very opaque. It's not overly thin like some sparkly eye shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Being a lover of almost all things "sparkly", this ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a lover of almost all things "sparkly", this product makes me giddy! It's intense, but also blends out well for a more subtle application. I have Kitten Karma, and will be repurchasing when I run out of it. I'm also going to order other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Aprilkevinlexie

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! Stay on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Stay on for a long time, easy to apply. The only con is it burns for a minute after application. I have super sensitive skin. Luckily the burning sensation goes away.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good but not glittery
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted Glitter and this is "shiny and shimmer" not Glitter. I gave to my niece and bought something else. I love Stila products but this is the shimmer one....
customer_reviews.author: TDailey

customer_reviews.title: This product is by far the best one I have bought in a longggg time
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far the best one I have bought in a longggg time. If your a professional makeup artist or just a beginner, this product does the job on its own with no fuss, no effort at all. You literally end with a great finish and will have everyone asking where and who did your makeup! This is a must have in you makeup collection!
customer_reviews.author: Lizhappyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and very sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for bringing attention to the eyes and perfect for holidays or special events. This product makes me wish it was ok to have glitter all over my eyes every day at work.
customer_reviews.author: LaLo2556

customer_reviews.title: ... your eyelids to glisten in the sun and shine like a glazed donut this is the product for you
customer_reviews.text: IF you want your eyelids to glisten in the sun and shine like a glazed donut this is the product for you. You will look like a piece of ancient Myan gold. Ten out of ten would try again.
customer_reviews.author: Faustina Welch

customer_reviews.title: It’s so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Stila liquid eyeshadows. They are so gorgeous and fun to incorporate into my makeup. One thing I found was it’s a little out of control when I try to use the applicator so I just put some of the product onto a brush and apply it that way. To me that is so much easier to apply without making a mess. Anyways, great product and will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Turner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and it does last. Would prefer it didn’t change so drastically in color...I like the pale blue
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff~!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it stays on the best of any other product I have used. There are many colors to chose from and has lasted a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive, but love these eye shadows./eyeliners (and they work great as both) and they stay, sparkle and are just too pretty. I've been looking for something that works this well and is this pretty for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SirGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best and most price worthy product I have ever used! You can do so much with it, whether its your tear line that you are filling in, your entire eye-I just lovee t!! Will forsure buy more shades! And also doesnt really crease unless it’s superhot outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning! So bright and sparkly! Cannot wait to wear at my wedding
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: its mostly purple...
customer_reviews.text: but its also a lot of blue. Was looking for purple but its still really pretty
customer_reviews.author: D Crozat

customer_reviews.title: I love this color kitten
customer_reviews.text: I love this color kitten! This is absolutely beautiful however I recommend you be very careful to not touch it after it sets because getting it in my eye when I scratched it was irritating. But when I wore it again and was more careful I was fine. It is SO beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: pretty color
customer_reviews.text: This product was very pretty when first purchased, but not long after it dried up and there is hardly any product in container....probably sitting on the shelf too long? Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Belanus

customer_reviews.title: All glitter, very little tint
customer_reviews.text: The pigment was so light I couldn't tell it was there, and the glitter was so big it looked like 90's body glitter. Not a fan, and way overpriced for what it was.
customer_reviews.author: sbs2DrT2

customer_reviews.title: SO many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! You will get that crazy full sparkle that you want. You can layer multiple coats and once if dries you forget you’re wearing it but other people dont! I have olive skin tone and my eye lids were a disco ball
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite easy to use super shiny liquid glitter eyeshadow
customer_reviews.author: Dazxed

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. I had my make-up professionally done
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. I had my make-up professionally done, and asked the make-up artist to use it on me. She loved the product. I was delighted with the way it looked on my eyes, and it stayed on all evening.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color I prefer this liquid eye shadow goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Goes on kind of thick and gloppy, color is pretty though
customer_reviews.author: KIM C

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.text: The glitter in my tube is chunky and flakes into my eyes throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: C Reece

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: My makeup looks like profesional with this, I'm in love with this
customer_reviews.author: JORGE ROSADO

customer_reviews.title: Sparkles
customer_reviews.text: Great sparkly eyeshadow. Love the black it does lighten up after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: iMLIZURNOT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow was expensive but it’s beautiful got the rose gold
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful color, and very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful color, and very easy to apply, however if you put it on the lid it will transfer into your crease with glitter. I am a makeup artist I've tried everything in the world to get this to simply stay on the lid it will not the sparkles migrate whether you use a primer or shadow or setting spray. So very impractical unless you want your whole eye to look sparkled.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joan Kellaway

customer_reviews.title: ✨ Shimmery without being pure glitter ✨
customer_reviews.text: The shine is just the perfect amount without being pure glitter (which, I also like to do). Stays on all day, and once it “dries”, it doesn’t get hard not sticky, it just feels like I’m wearing regular eye shadow, but it’s bold and shiny! Love this stuff for casual days or glam nights.
customer_reviews.author: Jillyleigh

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT say how much I love this product. It's great all around. Literally nothing bad to say. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks. easy to apply. Fades but essy to reapply
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite eye shadows. A little goes a long way. I like to contour my eyes with regular shadow before applying this on top. I love this for an evening out.
customer_reviews.author: N.N

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I expected the sparkles to be a bit smaller than pictures. More shimmer, than actual sparkles. However, I am making it work. It is definitely weekend/night wear (for me).
customer_reviews.author: Vik @Kris & Vik Book Therapy Cafe

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this product at a store, but felt like online shopping.... Buying this product online, well, mine was almost completely dried out. I would suggest making the effort to purchase in store.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the sparkle
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a glittery look. Easy and smooth application and stays on. Plus the colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: leya

customer_reviews.title: Waste is money 💰
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this eye shadow!! I love all things GLITTER. I had 3 more colors in my cart and I am so glad I didn’t buy them all at one time. Very disappointing 😭 I put in on and let it dry completely and it all flaked off all over my face within 20 minutes!! So sad
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same quality as you’d find at a higher end store such as Ulta or Sephora. The color kitten karma with spice up any neutral beauty look.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best sparkle shadow
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Stays in place all day. Solid glitter no patches!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchase

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t really like using this at first but i got the hang ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like using this at first but i got the hang of how to use and how much to use and i really like it now! It may take a couple tries to figure out what you like but it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ji M.

customer_reviews.title: stila Magnificent Metals Glitter & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow
customer_reviews.text: stila Magnificent Metals Glitter & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow covered my eyelids but left glitter over my entire face as the day wore on.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Not a thick layer of sparkles
customer_reviews.text: The sparkles aren't as thick as you'd expect. You'd need 3-5 layers to really get that heavy sparkle look and by then, it might crack or flake. I'm annoyed I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: BeverlyHillbilly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shadows
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shadows. The glitter payoff is amazing, and it lasts ALL day (I do use an Urban Decay primer under it, though). I wear contacts and this product does not irritate my eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: I do like this, I don't enjoy the glitter that seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this, I don't enjoy the glitter that seems to flake off though. If I could find a way for it not to come off, that'd be great!
customer_reviews.author: Ajsahxetron0609

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It dries after a minute or two and stays on all day. A little bit of fallout, but i can deal with it. I ended up buying almost all of them after wards!
customer_reviews.author: Megan St. John

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. The pigment is great. The buzz around these eyeshadows is legitimate. They are bold and perfect for a fancy night out (or the office if you're into that :) l
customer_reviews.author: twoplaces@once

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to add some special glam to your face, this stuff is it! Goes on smooth and sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Loyer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. It has minor fall out which is huge because it's the first glitter shadow that doesn't drive my contacts crazy. The color is pretty but it's not too extreme. Just right and lasts long. Already bought another shade.
customer_reviews.author: LCRC

customer_reviews.title: The best glitter eyeshadow on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying expensive eyeshadow so I was so worried when I bought this but it is worth every penny!! I get so many compliments on my eyeshadow that now other ladies at work are wearing this brand! Quick drying and long lasting..... glitter for days!! I freaking love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Deja Coffin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gutter shadow!!! 2nd time I have purchased!! I get so many compliments when I wear it!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the price
customer_reviews.text: Holy freaking grail if you are trying to get a glitter shadow. Highly recommended for the price. I do recommend putting it on with your own brush because the applicator isn't very precise but get product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Rose gold retro is a lovey color but insanely sparkly. Even behind my glasses, it looks from across the room as if I have glued diamonds to my eyelids. I can’t wear it to work because I’m not a hooker.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Great product with mutiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as it was on her wish list. While I thought it pricey, it is beautiful on and stays where applied.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!! Use it as a shadow, liner or a highlighter. looking forward to trying new colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cerrato

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pop of sparkle
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow! I usually use it on the inner corners of my eye and just dab a little on and spread it with a firm brush or my pinky. The color is a little more coppery than I was expecting but you can't really tell the color unless up very close.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bickerton

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and sparkly fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun and pretty. They dry quickly and the colors lasts all night. Sometimes they reflect a little in photographs but it doesn’t look bad.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This gold glitter eye shadow is amazing. It works exactly how I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: sam1212

product_meta.title: Stila Magnificent Metals Glitter & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow
product_meta.description:
Color:KITTEN KARMAThis brilliantly long-wearing sparkle eye shadow combines the perfect mix of pearl and glitter to lavish eyes with incredible luster and shimmer. With its uniquely lightweight, water-infused texture, it glides on effortlessly, then dries down smoothly, locking in maximum sparkle with minimal fallout, for eyes with a real "wow!" factor. Ingredients - water/aqua/eau, mica, aluminum calcium sodium silicate, calcium sodium borosilicate, hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer, squalane, polysorbate 60, polyethylene terephthalate, caprylyl glycol, hexylene glycol, phenoxyethanol, glycerin, triethanolamine, carbomer, silica. (+/-) titanium dioxide (ci 77891), tin oxide (ci 77861).

BRAND STORY
At the heart of Stila, we believe that the right makeup can turn even the simplest look into a statement as authentic as your signature.
